name: Whirlpool
description:
Whirlpool is a game made with RPG Maker MV; however, the game is not strictly speaking an RPG.
Whirlpool is about Roy, who finds himself suspiciously uncertain about a lot of things, including who he really is. And his adventure of finding out more about himself.
This adventure will include puzzles and mini-games, so the player will need to be focused in order to pass them.
